pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc.net

Class IMCProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc.net.IMCProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageBus

    public class IMCProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageBus
    This class implements the IMC protocol allowing sending / receiving messages and also discovery of IMC peers

    Example - wait until seacon-2 sends an EstimatedState message and print it to the screen: 
    IMCProtocol imc = new IMCProtocol(6001);
ImcSysState seacon2 = imc.state("lauv-seacon-2");
EstimatedState state = seacon2.pollEstimatedState(30000);
if (state != null)
    state.dump(System.out);
    Author:
    zp

      • announceAgeMillis

        public long announceAgeMillis(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieve time elapsed since last announce of given system name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the system
        Returns:
        Time, in milliseconds since last announce has been received from the given system.
        In the case the system has not announced itself yet, -1 is returned.

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String sysName,
                  IMCMessage msg)
        Send message to a remote system
        Parameters:
        sysName - The name of the system where to send the message
        msg - The message to be sent to the system
        Returns:
        true if the message was sent or false if no such system is known yet.

      • state

        public ImcSysState state(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieve the continuously updated state of the given system
        Parameters:
        name - The system for which to retrieve the state
        Returns:
        The existing system state or a newly created state (inactive) if that system is not yet known

      • startReplay

        public void startReplay(java.lang.String dirToReplay,
               double speed)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Replay an LSF log folder
        Parameters:
        dirToReplay - The folder where the files Data.lsf and IMC.xml can be found
        speed - The time multiplier (1.0 = real time)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In the case the folder cannot be read or any other IO errors
